channel.title: TrustPay on MultiSafepay Docs
channel.description: Recent content in TrustPay on MultiSafepay Docs

item.title: Activating TrustPay
item.description: If using a ready-made integration: First check that the payment method is supported. Once activated for your account, you must also enable the payment method in your backend. Sign in to your MultiSafepay dashboard. Go to Settings. To activate TrustPay for: All your websites, go to Payment methods. A specific website, go to Website settings, and click the relevant website. Select the checkbox for TrustPay.
